greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: matrix product A004736 * A158821.
link: G. C. Greubel, Rows n = 1..50 of the triangle, flattened
example: First few rows of the triangle =
program: (Magma) [k eq 1 select Binomial(n+1, 2) else (n-k+1)*(k-1): k in [1..n], n in [1..15]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Apr 01 2021
(Sage) flatten([[binomial(n+1, 2) if k==1 else (n-k+1)*(k-1) for k in (1..n)] for n in (1..15)]) # _G. C. Greubel_, Apr 01 2021
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_ & _Roger L. Bagula_, Mar 28 2009
ext: Corrected A-number in a formula - _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 30 2009
